Lacfin Composited Facial Sheet Mask

Brand: Lacfin

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Sodium Hyaluronate, Panthenol, Malus Domestica (apple) Fruit Cell Culture, Hydrolyzed collagen, Milk Protein, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8 (Argireline), Palmitoyl Dipeptide-10, OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) LEAF EXTRACT, Tropaeolum majus flower/lead/stem Extract, Porphyridium cruentum extract, Camellia Sinensis leaf Extract, Rosmarinus officinalis

Palmitoyl Dipeptide-10, OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) LEAF EXTRACT, Tropaeolum majus flower/lead/stem Extract, Porphyridium cruentum extract, Camellia Sinensis leaf Extract, Rosmarinus officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Honey Extract, Glycerin, Water (Aqua), Sodium Levulinate, Sodium Anisate, Phenoxyethanol

Directions: 1. Cleanse and dry your face thoroughtly and unfold the sheet mask. 2. Remove the white protective layer gently. Place the maks with blue protective side facing outward. Apply from forehead down to your chin. Align the openings provided in the mask with your eyes, nostrils, and mouth alike. 3. Peel off the blue protective layer. Smooth

protective side facing outward. Apply from forehead down to your chin. Align the openings provided in the mask with your eyes, nostrils, and mouth alike. 3. Peel off the blue protective layer. Smooth air bubbles toward edges, until it firmly adheres to the face. 4. Allow ingredients to absorb for 10 to 15 minutes before removing. Avoid cleansing

3. Peel off the blue protective layer. Smooth air bubbles toward edges, until it firmly adheres to the face. 4. Allow ingredients to absorb for 10 to 15 minutes before removing. Avoid cleansing or rinsing the face after removing mask.

Warnings: This product is strictly for external use. Use only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes. In case of itching, redness or rash in skin, discontinue use immediately. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
